content: > click here to view and download the pattern from my blog 1 this simple ribbed hat is the perfect choice for those who are hard to find gifts for this ribbed hat will stretch and contract to fit a range of head adult head sizes which makes it perfect for gifted to friends and family this hat is also reversible _______________________________ **pattern information* this hat is worked in the round from the crown to brim in a 2x3 ribbed pattern instructions are both written and charted ____________________________________ **finished circumference** 20 22 8 25 75 in / 50 57 64 25 cm **gauge** 2 5mm us #1 5 24-inch circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge 28 sts and 44 row in 4 in / 10 cm in rib pattern **yarn** fingering weight yarn 192 231 277 yds / 175 211 253 m **techniques** magic_ring cast on tubular bind off __________________________________________________ this pattern has been tech edited and tested my patterns are for advanced beginners and up you should have a basic understanding of increases decreases and other basic stitches and techniques such as grafting and casting on tutorial links will be provided to certain techniques 1 https //www frasierknits net/post/simple-ribbed-hat-free-knitting-pattern
